articles.title: Joel Schumacher, eclectic film director who ranged from blockbusters to low-budget thrillers – obituary - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: He made Brat Pack classics, won the lucrative Batman and John Grisham franchises and discovered a galaxy of young stars
articles.content: An only child, Joel Schumacher was born on August 29 1939 in a poor area of New York to Francis Schumacher, a Baptist from Tennessee, and Marian (née Kantor), a Swedish Jew. His father died suddenly … [+2375 chars]

articles.title: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry rift had surprising impact on Prince William and Charles - Express
articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE and Prince Harry's mounting tensions with the rest of the Royal Family prompted Prince William and Prince Charles to forge a closer relationship, a royal expert has claimed.
